title: Come Down (4R146)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Archery: Spot 2 [Isengard] archers to make allies take wounds from archery fire instead of companions.
Lore:	”'We are the fighting Uruk-hai…. Bring out your skulking king!'”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	This card allows all allies to take wounds from archery fire.
